mapper.sql: order_uuid , flow_definition_key, flow_definition_version, create_time, creator_id, input_variables, update_operator_id, update_time, status
mapper.insert: insert into wb_flow_order(order_uuid, flow_definition_key, flow_definition_version, create_time, creator_id, input_variables, update_operator_id, update_time, status) values (#{entity.orderUuid}, #{entity.flowDefinitionKey}, #{entity.flowDefinitionVersion}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.creatorId}, #{entity.inputVariables}, #{entity.creatorId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.status})
mapper.select: select * from wb_flow_order o where o.status in ('ready', 'processing')
